laws.text:
00 - LAW
Unverified claims or anonymous statements are not allowed without confirmation from authorities.

01 - RECOMMENDATION
In these times of unrest, focus on achievements and greatness of the state.

02 - LAW
It is prohibited to publish scandalous news without the prior approval of the designated Officer.

03 - LAW
It is prohibited to expose class disparity.

04 - RECOMMENDATION
Portray the suppression of dissent as a necessary act of patriotism.

05 - LAW
Publishing foreign media content or quoting international sources is banned.
